definition: to send/to devote/to deliver/to cause/to convey

sentences.english: In this season, red Yuelu Mountain is most attractive for visitors.
sentences.chinese: 这个季节，红叶是岳麓山最吸引游人的景致。

sentences.english: A view of Pei-Men Station, Alishan Forestry Railway(Alishan Line), Chia-Yi.
sentences.chinese: 北门车站外的景致，阿里山森林铁路北门车站。

sentences.english: The hotel terrace has views of the Plaza de España and the María Luisa Park.
sentences.chinese: 酒店露台享有西班牙广场和玛丽亚路易莎公园的景致。

sentences.english: Three friends were rowing; Ye and I were sitting in the middle, enjoying ourselves in the scenery surrounding us.
sentences.chinese: 三个朋友划着船，我和叶坐在船中望四周的景致。

sentences.english: Emergency car left the site, only to enjoy the car window Xianxin scene.
sentences.chinese: 有事坐车离开工地，才有闲心欣赏车窗外的景致。

sentences.english: Far view, also has a" water Bishan red" Dan cliff scenery features.
sentences.chinese: 远观，同样具有“水碧山红”的丹崖景致特点。

sentences.english: These sights were no longer just pictures in a book.
sentences.chinese: 这些景致已不再是停留在书本上的照片了。

sentences.english: The view is what we see on the back of 10 Yuan RMB.
sentences.chinese: 这个景致是10元人民币上的那幅画。

sentences.english: What about the slow-growth rich world?
sentences.chinese: 那么那些增长缓慢的富裕国家又是何等景致呢？

sentences.english: To the immediate and vivid picture of this landscape can not be non-m point techniques.
sentences.chinese: 要传神地描绘眼前的这幅景致，非米点技法不可。

sentences.english: The most scenic area of the harbour is on the ocean side of the bridge.
sentences.chinese: 最好的景致是大桥边临海的地方。

sentences.english: The remains of snow from the severe winter storm that hit last month, made the scenery extra pleasant.
sentences.chinese: 上月刚过去的寒冬积雪残存，令景致更加美丽。

sentences.english: Amongst the many sights one can see along the trail are the old converted railway stations.
sentences.chinese: 沿著这条小路，看到最多的景致是老旧改变的火车站。

sentences.english: My father and mother never so much as remark on the beauty of this scene!
sentences.chinese: 恁般景致，我父母为何从不带我一游？

sentences.english: After climbing the hilltop, you have a panoramic view of mountain scenery.
sentences.chinese: 登上山巅以后，山下的景致尽收眼底。

sentences.english: There is really a kind of ever-beautiful and marvelous view.
sentences.chinese: 实在亦有一种奇绝壮绝的景致。

definition: scenic lakes and mountain (idiom); beautiful lake and mountain landscape
nothing more beautiful can be imagined (idiom)
